title: can you help me to find that typography?
content:
Hi everyone;

I'm just looking for this kind of typography for a new project, do you know what sort of typography is??

thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426051532im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sin%20t%C3%ADtulo_3648.jpg)
author: oskrbt1983

comments.content: This can be done to fonts using Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop.
yes, i know that this typography is modified in illustrator or corel draw... but the I need that kind of word
Tasse Regular Condensed from Font Bureau looks very close if not perfect.
